## Template for Assignment 1 in Reproducible Reserach

### "Reading and transfomring the Data"
```{r, echo=TRUE}
activity<-read.csv("/Users/connorburleigh/Coursera/activity.csv")
library(lubridate)
activity$date<-ymd(activity$date)
timedate<-ymd_hms(activity$date + dminutes(activity$interval))
activity<-cbind(activity,timedate)
```

#Question 1
## Calculate and plot the total, mean and median number of steps taken.

```{r, echo=TRUE}
noNA<-na.omit(activity)
STEPS<-aggregate(noNA$steps, by=(list(noNA$date)), FUN="sum")
plot(STEPS,type="h",ylab="Steps",xlab="Date")
print(mean(STEPS$x))
print(median(STEPS$x))
```

#Question 2
## Plot the average daily activity
```{r}
INTERVAL<-aggregate(noNA$steps, by=(list(noNA$interval)), FUN="mean")
plot(INTERVAL,type="l",ylab="Steps",xlab="Minutes")
colnames(INTERVAL)<-(c("Interval","Mean"))
Maxline<-INTERVAL[which(INTERVAL$Mean==max(INTERVAL$Mean)),]
```
